item.title: Kotlin Multiplatform
item.description: I never thought I would write an article to praise mobile a cross-platform mobile framework, well, Kotlin Multiplatform allowed this to happen! Â Throughout my career in mobile development, I faced multiple situations where I had to maintain applications built with cross-platform frameworks such as: Oracles Mobile Application Framework (AKA: MAF) a framework based on PhoneGap by Oracle. React Native by Facebook. I also briefly checked technologies such as Titanium by Appcelerator and Flutter by Google.
